resources.string: Authentication is required to view the history list
Your device may not support biometric authentication
You have enabled the "Display over other apps" permission
Permission not granted. Tap to go to settings
Judge true/false and answer with Yes/No
The request body is malformed or missing required fields. Please check your query content.
The Gemini API free tier is not available in your country (China), or you have not enabled billing for your project in Google AI Studio. Please set up a payment plan in Google AI Studio.
Gemini API request error (%d), there may be an issue with the request content.
Your Gemini API key does not have the required permissions. Please check the key settings or ensure proper authentication.
The requested resource was not found by the Gemini API. Please check if the request parameters or API version are valid.
Gemini API rate limit exceeded. You are sending too many requests per minute. Please try again later or request a quota increase.
An unexpected error occurred in the Gemini backend. Your input context may be too long. Please try shortening the content or retry later.
The Gemini service is temporarily unavailable or overloaded. Please try again later.
The Gemini service could not complete the processing within the deadline. Your query may be too large. Please try shortening the content or setting a longer timeout if supported.
Gemini network or server error: HTTP %d - %s
Gemini API Key is not configured. Please go to the settings page to enter your API key.
Grok API Key is not configured. Please go to the settings page to enter your API key.
Grok request is malformed (400). Please check the request body, URL, or if the API key is correct.
Grok unauthorized (401). Authorization header is missing or the token is invalid. Please get a new API key from the xAI Console.
Grok access forbidden (403). Your API key/team does not have permission to perform this action or has been blocked. Please contact your team administrator.
Grok not found (404). The requested model or endpoint URL does not exist. Please check if the request model and URL are correct.
Grok method not allowed (405). The request method is incorrect. Please check the API reference documentation.
Grok unsupported media type (415). The POST request body is empty or did not specify Content-Type: application/json. Please add a valid request body and ensure the Content-Type header exists.
Grok unprocessable entity (422). A field in the POST request body is invalid. Please check the request body format.
Grok too many requests (429). You are sending requests too frequently and have reached the rate limit. Please reduce the request frequency or apply for a quota increase.
Grok request accepted (202), but the response is not yet available. Please wait for the request to be processed.
Grok network or server error: HTTP %d - %s
DeepSeek request is malformed (400). Please modify the request body according to the error message.
DeepSeek authentication failed (401). Incorrect API Key. Please check your API key.
DeepSeek insufficient balance (402). Your account balance has been depleted. Please top up.
DeepSeek invalid parameters (422). The request contains invalid parameters. Please modify the request parameters according to the error message.
DeepSeek rate limit (429). You are sending requests too quickly. Please control the request frequency reasonably.
DeepSeek server error (500). The server encountered a problem. Please try again later, and if the problem persists, contact us.
DeepSeek server overload (503). The server is overloaded due to high traffic. Please try again later.
DeepSeek network or server error: HTTP %d - %s
Network connection failed. Please check your network settings.
Failed to fetch API Key or other internal error occurred: %s
An unknown error occurred with model %s: %s
